column1: #Text=Gloucester is the county town of Gloucestershire in England 's West Country .
#Text=The City of Gloucester is the furthest inland port in the UK , situated beside the River Severn .
#Text=It inspired the old English nursery rhyme :
#Text=' Dick Whittington ' , born around 1350 , a well-known character through the pantomime story , has connections with Gloucester .
#Text=The story is based on the real-life Richard Whittington , who , unlike his pantomime character , was not poor , being the third son of Sir William Whittington of Gloucester .
#Text=The traditional tale has a ' poor ' Dick going to London to seek his fortune , but he eventually becomes Lord Mayor of London .
